name: Euclidean Escape
description:
Historically inaccurate first-person puzzle game. Explore the ancient secrets of the Great Library and navigate through mystical mazes. Manipulate and combine the powers of Force, Energy and Matter to ascend a tower with challenges that rise along with your altitude.

This is just a prototype demo, if you're interested in the full game, wishlist it here: 

Euclidean Escape - Steam page

Made by:
  • Raven Insights (Unity game dev)
  • Tiny Meow studio (3D Artist)

Let us know what you think about it and discuss the game with other players on our discord server.

You can also follow us on facebook.

We really want to hear any feedback you have for us!
